DOC.brief_summary: This study exploratory comparison efficacy safety paricalcitol injection maxacalcitol injection chronic kidney disease participant receive hemodialysis secondary hyperparathyroidism .
DOC.brief_title: Paricalcitol Compared Maxacalcitol Chronic Kidney Disease Patients With Secondary Hyperparathyroidism
DOC.criteria: Chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) patient iPTH > =300 pg/mL , adjust calcium > =8.4 < 10.2 mg/dL , phosphorus < =6.5 mg/dL Patients receive dialysis 3 time weekly least 3 month inform consent obtain schedule receive hemodialysis study period Patients use dialysate constant concentration calcium 4 week inform consent obtain receive phosphate binder constant dose regimen 2 week inform consent obtain Patients take drug affect iPTH , calcium , bone metabolism Patients history allergic reaction significant sensitivity vitamin D Patients receive parathyroidectomy ethanol infusion within 1 year inform consent obtain Patients malignancy clinically significant hepatic disease ( liver function test 3 time upper limit normal ) refractory hepatic disease Patients cardiovascular disease designate New York Heart Association Class III IV follow cardiovascular cerebrovascular disease within 6 month inform consent obtain : Acute coronary syndrome ( myocardial infarction unstable angina ) acute cerebral vascular disease ( cerebral infarction cerebral hemorrhage ) Coronary arterial revascularization ( coronary artery bypass grafting , percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty ) Cerebral arterial revascularization ( cerebral aneurysm clipping , cerebral aneurysm embolization , carotid artery endarterectomy ) Arteriosclerosis obliterans rest pain ( Fontaine classification III severe ) Patients severe hypertension ( define mean rest blood pressure take patient supine position dialysis 6 dialysis session inform consent obtain : systolic > = 180 mmHg diastolic > = 110 mmHg ) Patients uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ( defined mean glycosylated hemoglobin > =8 % 3 month inform consent obtain ) Patients history drug alcohol abuse within 6 month inform consent obtain Patients require chronic use cytochrome P450 ( CYP3A ) inhibitor inducer Patients take product contain aluminum 2 week inform consent obtain Patients take paricalcitol past
